title: KHR_character_expression_mapping glTF Document Extension
description: glTF extension that enables encoding multiple expression set mappings, mapping source expressions present in the model to target expressions that a runtime/endpoint understands.

expressionSetMappings.description: Dictionary of expression set mappings, where each key is a target expression set name.

additionalProperties.description: Expression mapping dictionary where each key is a target expression name and each value is an array of source expression mappings.
Array of source expression mappings that contribute to the target expression.

source.description: Name of the source expression in the model.

weight.description: Relative influence of this source expression on the target. Weights represent the proportional contribution needed to achieve the desired target result.
